meanings.definition: designed for defense against enemy aircraft
meanings.sent1: The soldiers used antiaircraft weapons to protect their base from enemy planes.
meanings.sent2: The antiaircraft system was installed on the military vehicles to ensure safety.
meanings.sent3: The antiaircraft technology was so advanced that it could even detect stealthy enemy aircraft.
meanings.sent4: Her quick reflexes were like antiaircraft defense, always ready to intercept any negative comments.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the antiaircraft warning lights made them easily visible even in the dark.

meanings.definition: a gun or missile designed for defense against enemy aircraft
meanings.sent1: The antiaircraft fired a missile that successfully took down the enemy plane.
meanings.sent2: During the war, the soldiers relied on antiaircraft to protect their airspace.
meanings.sent3: The antiaircraft gun looked intimidating, but it was essential for the safety of the troops.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the antiaircraft firing echoed through the valley, signaling the defense in action.
meanings.sent5: The precision of the antiaircraft targeting system amazed everyone with its accuracy.
